metadata.title: CVE-2014-3246 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Collabtive 1.2 allows remote authenticatedusers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the folder parameter in afileview_list action to manageajax.php.

criterions.comment: collabtive: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
